Name: Grand Star warps Mario

Scripts.Name: Enable
Scripts.Script:
Imports Microsoft.VisualBasic
Imports System
Imports System.Collections.Generic
Imports System.IO
Imports System.Linq
Imports System.Windows.Forms
Imports SM64Lib
Imports SM64Lib.Data
Imports SM64Lib.Behaviors
Imports SM64Lib.Behaviors.Script
Imports DevComponents.DotNetBar

Module Script

    Private Const VALUE_PATCHED as Byte = &H20
    Private Const VALUE_VANILLA as Byte = &H10
    Private Const BEHAVIOR_ADDRESS as integer = &H13001714
    Private Const COMMAND_ID = BehaviorscriptCommandTypes.x2F_SetInteraction

    Sub Main(params as IReadOnlyDictionary(Of String, Object))
        Dim mgr as RomManager = params("rommgr")
        Dim msgRes = MessageBox.Show("Do you want to enable (Yes) or disable (No) this patch?", "Grand Star Warps Mario", MessageBoxButtons.YesNoCancel, MessageBoxIcon.Question)
        
        If msgRes <> DialogResult.Cancel Then
            Dim valueToPatch As Byte
            If msgRes = DialogResult.Yes
                valueToPatch =  VALUE_PATCHED
            else
                valueToPatch = VALUE_VANILLA
            end if
            
            'Check if Global Behavior Bank is enabled
            if mgr.GlobalBehaviorBank.Config.Enabled Then
                'Try getting behavior by segmented address
                Dim behav = mgr.GlobalBehaviorBank.GetBehaviorByBankAddress(BEHAVIOR_ADDRESS)
                
                'If behav exists, check every behaviorscript command
                If behav IsNot Nothing Then
                    Dim cmd = behav.Script.FirstOfType(COMMAND_ID)
                    
                    'If command is that we are searching for, then write the new value to it
                    cmd.Position                        = 6
                    cmd.Write(valueToPatch)
                    cmd.Position = 0
                End If
            Else
                'Write directly to ROM
                Dim rom = mgr.GetBinaryRom(FileAccess.ReadWrite)
                rom.Position = &H21B522
                rom.Write(valueToPatch)
                rom.Close()
            End IF
        End IF
    End Sub

End Module

Description: The Grand Star that the final Bowser fight drops warps Mario instead of starting a cutscene. In order to use this, in your hack's 3rd Bowser fight, go to editor, go to the warps tab (the one next to the objects tab and the collision tab). Create a warp with ID 0, and then set the destination of the warp to someplace valid, note that the End Cake screen is a valid destination. This tweak is identical to the Grand Star Warps to Credits Level tweak, barring requiring to set up the warp without aid of the tweak and being a little safer to apply.
